lpc.board = mksnano_3.0; 

//LED blinks to indicate Platform is spinning or other diagnostic 
//Comment out or set to NoPin if not wanted.
leds.diagnostic = C.14; 

heat.tempSensePins = {bedtemp, e0temp}; //Max of 3 entries
//heat.spiTempSensorCSPins = { }; //Max of 2 entries

//ESP Settings
//CS
8266wifi.csPin = C.15
// IO0
//8266wifi.espDataReadyPin = E.10; //RRF
8266wifi.espDataReadyPin = C.13; //MKS Robin WIFI
// IO1
//8266wifi.lpcTfrReadyPin = E.13; //RRF
8266wifi.lpcTfrReadyPin = C.7; //MKS Robin WIFI
// RESET
//8266wifi.espResetPin = C.5; //RRF
8266wifi.espResetPin = E.9; //MKS Robin WIFI
//ESP RX/TX Settings
//8266wifi.serialRxTxPins = { 0.3, 0.2 } ;
8266wifi.serialRxTxPins = { A.10, A.9 } ;

serial.aux.rxTxPins = {B.11, B.10};
//TMC Smart Drivers
stepper.numSmartDrivers = 4;

// 12864 display settings
lcd.encoderPinA=E.8;
lcd.encoderPinB=E.11;
lcd.encoderPinSw=E.13;
lcd.lcdCSPin=E.10;
lcd.spiChannel=1;
SPI1.pins={A.5, A.6, A.7};
lcd.lcdBeepPin=C.5;
